text: E fo, God kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuan markɨ.” Egha a uaghan kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gumazibav soghtɨma me arɨmɨghɨran markɨ.” Eghtɨ ia poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuan koghɨva, egh ia gumazir mam mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham, kamaghɨn ia Moses Osirizir Araziba abɨzir gumazibar otifi.
